name: Scroll attack
description:
This is a game initialy make for the mizjam1 https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1

But i didn't can send the game at time because one storm in my country, so i decided to continue developen the game and finish all.

The effect of the shake camera with red sky when the character hit is a suggestion made by https://www.reddit.com/u/st4153/ and im putting right now, tell me guys, what do you think?

The sounds and music are download from Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/ and from OpenGameArt https://opengameart.org/content/free-music-pack respectively.

You can download the game right now!! Go down and choose your platform (Linux, Mac, Windows) and play, enjoy and thank you!
